post¶

Synopsis¶

Send a POST request to a device

Parameters¶

Parameter

Description

std::string serial

Serial number of the product for which to receive the request

std::string path

URL of the request

std::string data

Body of the request

std::function<void(Response&)> fn

Calback function with response from the request

Example¶

Requst about data

altronix::AtxNet net{};

net.post(
    "B3445ED2CDr2AC33298CXdd443",
    "/ATX/about",
    "{\"siteId\":\"New Site Id\"}",
    [=](altronix::Response& response) {
        if(response.error != LINQ_ERROR_OK) {
          std::cout << "Received error!\n" << response.error;
        }else {
          std::cout << response.response << "\n";
        }
});
